cont.entity_a: The USB model lacks sufficient power through the USB port for Mac G4 laptops.
cont.entity_b: Runs hot and may cause system issues.

cont.entity_a: Fast and easy online return policy.
Storage capacity matches desktop computer needs and is efficient and easy to use.
cont.entity_b: Boosts DirecTV's HR20 DVR storage capacity significantly. Actual available space is less than advertised. Drive has large storage capacity with included software.

cont.entity_a: Does not include a Firewire port, only a USB 2 port.
cont.entity_b: USB interface works well, but eSATA interface causes system lockups. USB 2.0 is slower compared to Firewire 800.

cont.entity_a: Ideal for backing up photos and music files.

Some older laptops occasionally fail to recognize the drive. SmartDisk USB line is incompatible with some Mac laptops. Incompatible with some Toshiba notebooks and Apple Powerbooks. Customer support indicated incompatibility with Powerbook G4.
cont.entity_b: Failed to reformat to Mac OS despite manufacturer claims. Drive not recognized on some computers.

cont.entity_a: Speed is satisfactory with up to 50GB file transfer in about an hour.
cont.entity_b: No issues with the on/off switch; eSATA connection is extremely fast. Worse write speed compared to WD 500 GB.

cont.entity_a: Inexpensive drives may be unreliable on certain laptops.
Comes with free backup software and is fast.
cont.entity_b: Software included is excellent and offers data security.

cont.entity_a: Small, lightweight, and does not require external power. Nice design but lacks a short USB cable and a more visible indicator light.
cont.entity_b: Interchangeable design aids in data retrieval from failed ports. On/off button is uncomfortable.

cont.entity_a: USB 1.1 port insufficient for power, but works with provided PS/2 cable.
cont.entity_b: Interface board allows data retrieval from older disks.

cont.entity_a: Failed after iTunes transfer, but received a full refund. Received a refurbished unit that periodically jams.
cont.entity_b: Frequent overheating leads to data loss.
Fast performance and small footprint. Quiet and efficient operation.
